title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7439.2 - Definitions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7439.2 - Definitions

State Regulations

As used in this Part, the term living area shall mean an
area in which the residents sleep, shower and participate in program and
leisure activities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7439.2

Renumbered from subtitle AA of chapter III
New

York State Register April 11, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 15, eff. 4/11/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
